sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AutoResolutionMLFactory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AutoResolutionMLFactory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AutoResolutionMLFactory = Class.create();

AutoResolutionMLFactory.createMLHelper = function(arConfigId) {	
	if (AutoResolutionUtil.checkSolutionWithCapabilityExists(arConfigId, AutoResolutionConstants.AZ_ENCODED_QUERY) || !AutoResolutionLanguageHelper.isLanguageConfigRecordPresent(arConfigId))
		return new global.AutoResolutionMLHelper(arConfigId);
	else if (AutoResolutionUtil.checkSolutionWithCapabilityExists(arConfigId, AutoResolutionConstants.LX_ENCODED_QUERY))
		return new global.AutoResolutionLanguageX(arConfigId);
	else
		throw "Solution capability is not supported by Issue Auto-resolution";
};

AutoResolutionMLFactory.createMLHelperForCapability = function(capability, arConfigId) {
	if (capability === AutoResolutionConstants.ML_CAPBILITIES.AGENT_ZERO || 
		capability === AutoResolutionConstants.ML_CAPBILITIES.AGENT_ZERO_WORKFLOW)
		return new global.AutoResolutionMLHelper(arConfigId);
	else if (capability === AutoResolutionConstants.ML_CAPBILITIES.LANGUAGEX) 
		return new global.AutoResolutionLanguageX(arConfigId);
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-22 19:36:43</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5dd3cc9e77b90110f14a24f1cd5a99eb</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AutoResolutionMLFactory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Issue Auto-Resolution" source="com.glide.cs.auto_resolution">85493a472f800110d8a4d5f62799b6a9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5dd3cc9e77b90110f14a24f1cd5a99eb</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-13 17:19:07</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1046</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
